title: Sharon Osbourne explains why she'll never work with Simon Cowell again

Sharon Osbourne has spurned Simon Cowell ’s olive branch about appearing together again on TV.

She insisted: “I don’t want to work with him.”

Her remark comes after Simon told the Mirror he phoned her to patch things up amid a feud and added she is “always welcome back” on his TV shows.

Asked about the comments, Sharon said: “Because I said certain things about, and to, Simon, doesn’t mean I hate him for ever, just for that second I don’t like him... He is OK, it’s just I don’t want to work with him.”

Simon, 60, spoke last week about phoning her “the other day” to smooth things over. But she said on her US talk show The Talk: “The other day? It was May 2018, I haven’t heard from him since.”

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: Getty Images)

Sharon, 67 today, previously claimed Simon booted her off The X Factor last year for being too old.

As the row rumbled on, she said: “If you want young, fire yourself and get rid of those man-t*ts.”

Meanwhile, Simon was pictured leaving his 60th birthday bash last night clutching a bottle of wine and two packs of cigarettes.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Earlier in the night, Simon took a break from the America's Got Talent filming schedule for a family dinner to celebrate the milestone.

He and girlfriend Lauren Silverman were joined by their son Eric, five, and Lauren's son Adam, 13, as the four hit up Nobu in Malibu.

Simon will be back on our screens this Saturday night as X Factor: Celebrity kicks off.
description: EXCLUSIVE: The former X Factor judge says she has no interest in ever working with the music mogul again after he sacked her as a judge
